pr_title: Extract files stored within metadata hash into ByteArrayIndexInputs

timeline.message: Extract files stored within metadata hash into ByteArrayIndexInputs

timeline.bodyText: I think it'd be better to assert this (inline) in the constructor.
timeline.author: DaveCTurner

timeline.bodyText: It looks like fileInfo.metadata().hash() is not today a slice of the underlying byte array (i.e. it has zero offset and full length) but I don't think we guarantee that in future. I think we should  pass offset and length to the ByteArrayIndexInput constructor just to be sure.
timeline.author: DaveCTurner

timeline.bodyText: If we move the assertion to the constructor then this isn't necessary.
timeline.author: DaveCTurner
